title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include a correct difference quotient.
The student response accurately includes a correct difference quotient.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
At most 2 out of 3 points if mathematical notation for any limit is missing or incorrect.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
At most 1 out of 2 points if mathematical notation for any limit is missing or incorrect OR if response includes jump discontinuity at maximum of one incorrect value.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Any value between 2.615 and 2.621 earns the estimate point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.
